+40, perfect, T5 ensorcell, acid/impact/web ironwright, rotflares, +10 AS expb bane, maxlight pike This was my quote from Duskruin:

 Item: a silvery blue mithril pike
 Modified Weighting Type: Critical
 Current Service Window Count: 0
 Service Window Reset: 0d 0h 0m
 Estimated Costs:
   Next Service: 738 bloodscrip
   Next 5 Services: 3694 bloodscrip
   Next 10 Services: 8311 bloodscrip
   Next 15 Services: 19394 bloodscrip
   Next 20 Services: 32323 bloodscrip
   Next 25 Services: 72959 bloodscrip

At the time, I got 10 services done. I am still in that 60-day window.

My quote from Saryen for 10 more services (crit weighting) was 14434060. So that's a conversion rate of 601 silver per scrip. Kind of like "half price" relative to current BS/silver exchange rate.
